twitterPosts.content:
Piggycell is coming soon to the RWA Inc. Private Investor Platform

@piggycell has 13,000+ charging stations and 100,000+ deployed batteries.

A proven DePIN leader now open to on-chain investors.

 Real infrastructure powered by Web3
 Fully transparent, on-chain revenue

Yesterday, a newly signed client bought and staked $10,000 of $RWAINC, locking it for 180 days.

This isn’t a marketing stunt.
It’s our onboarding standard. Every client stakes $10K for 180 days, no exceptions.

Real commitment, real alignment, real utility for our token.

TX:

Just 1 day left. The 80% early investor token release drop is here.

This changes everything.

With early investor vesting almost complete, we’re entering a new era of real scarcity. Fewer unlocks. Less sell pressure. Truly deflationary.

Soon, the Private Investor Platform will
